value.stringValue: Raise a ticket with this message: {!adviceType} orchestration. No advice type status found for {!advice.Advice_Status__c}.
Raise a ticket with this message: {!adviceType} orchestration flow. {!task.OW_task_information_name__c} task not found.

Flow.description: Orchestrates the specific tasks for protection advice.

formulas.name: confirmModalMessage
formulas.expression: IF({!DataGatheringNotRequiredNow.renderNext}, "Are you sure you want to mark data gathering as not required? No information requests may be linked and the advice will complete data gathering without them.", IF({!DataGatheringRequiredNow.renderNext}, "Are you sure you want to mark data gathering as required? This advice will complete data gathering when associated information requests receive their information.", IF({!DataGatheringProceedWhileInProgress.renderNext}, "Associated information requests are not yet at information received. Are you sure you want to complete data gathering with information outstanding?", "")))

formulas.description: Maps the information request input from the screen to a DataGatheringStatus__c field picklist value. Returns error for an unmapped value, which will trigger an error in the field as it is restricted to picklist values.
formulas.name: dataGatheringStatusFormula

formulas.description: Contextual help for the data gathering status field.
formulas.name: dataGatheringStatusHelp
formulas.expression: CASE({!advice.DataGatheringStatus__c}, "Not required", "No information requests are needed for this advice.", "In progress", "This will update to complete automatically when all associated information requests have their information.", "Complete", "", "")

formulas.description: The date on which the advice deck expires.
formulas.name: deckExpiryDate

formulas.description: Maps the profile status input from the screen to a ProfileUpdateStatus__c field picklist value. Returns error for an unmapped value, which will trigger an error in the field as it is restricted to picklist values.
formulas.name: profileUpdateStatusFormula

Flow.label: Advice | Protection | Orchestrator

fields.name: ConfirmCompleteShareDeck
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Click next to progress with this task.

fields.name: recConfirm
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed to update the recommendations.

fields.name: ConfirmCompletePrompt
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

When you have finished the work for this task, click complete task to trigger the next steps.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_ConfirmCompletePrompt
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Record any status updates and proceed.

fields.name: ProfileUpdateStatus
fields.helpText: Mark as complete if we have everything from the client or not required if profiles updates are no longer needed.

fields.name: ConfirmCompletePromptSetup
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Provide answers to the questions below and proceed.

fields.name: IntroductionsMade
fields.helpText: There is no rule on what to do here but please ensure that any appropriate introductions to the client have been made.

fields.name: ProfileUpdatesAdvice
fields.helpText: Select yes if we are missing anything like the details of an existing protection policy. This will trigger a task for ops to get those specific details.

fields.name: ProfileUpdatesNeededDetail
fields.helpText: Provide details of the profile updates needed.

fields.name: InformationRequestsAdvice
fields.helpText: Select yes if we still need to complete the information request process for any existing protection policies. This will trigger a task for ops to kick these off.

variables.description: The advice record that is being worked with.
variables.name: advice

variables.description: The advice type status record that applies for this advice given its current status.
variables.name: adviceTypeStatus

variables.description: Passed out to the orchestration flow, this indicates whether the task passed in should be closed.
variables.name: closeTask
